title: Get all RACING GAME-features-track-layout Relationships
description:
* A list of all ›features-track-layout‹ relationships for the selected RACING GAME is returned when there exists at least one of them. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Each item in the list contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty list is returned when no ›features-track-layout‹ relationship exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a RACING GAME. -> Status Code \`404\`
